すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GrabKeyDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A dialog for getting shortcut keys.

関連項目:
直列化された形式

入れ子のクラスの概要
static class GrabKeyDialog.KeyBinding
          A jEdit action or macro with its two possible shortcuts.

コンストラクタの詳細

GrabKeyDialog

public GrabKeyDialog(java.awt.Dialog parent,
                     GrabKeyDialog.KeyBinding binding,
                     java.util.List<GrabKeyDialog.KeyBinding> allBindings,
                     Buffer debugBuffer)
Create and show a new modal dialog.

パラメータ:
parent - center dialog on this component.
binding - the action/macro that should get a binding.
allBindings - all other key bindings.
debugBuffer - debug info will be dumped to this buffer (may be null)
導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 4.1pre7

GrabKeyDialog

public GrabKeyDialog(java.awt.Frame parent,
                     GrabKeyDialog.KeyBinding binding,
                     java.util.List<GrabKeyDialog.KeyBinding> allBindings,
                     Buffer debugBuffer)
Create and show a new modal dialog.

パラメータ:
parent - center dialog on this component.
binding - the action/macro that should get a binding.
allBindings - all other key bindings.
debugBuffer - debug info will be dumped to this buffer (may be null)
導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 4.1pre7
メソッドの詳細

toString

@Deprecated
public static java.lang.String toString(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
推奨されていません。 use AbstractInputHandler.toString(java.awt.event.KeyEvent)

getShortcut

public java.lang.String getShortcut()
Returns the shortcut, or null if the current shortcut should be removed or the dialog either has been cancelled. Use isOK() to determine if the latter is true.

isOK

public boolean isOK()
Returns true, if the dialog has not been cancelled.

導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 3.2pre9

isManagingFocus

public boolean isManagingFocus()
Returns if this component can be traversed by pressing the Tab key. This returns false.

getFocusTraversalKeysEnabled

public boolean getFocusTraversalKeysEnabled()
Makes the tab key work in Java 1.4.

オーバーライド:
クラス java.awt.Component 内の getFocusTraversalKeysEnabled
導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 3.2pre4

getSymbolicName

public static java.lang.String getSymbolicName(int keyCode)
